TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed MissingMappingAction extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Determines the action that occurs when a mapping is missing from a source table or a source column.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The MissingMappingAction values are used as arguments in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMappingCollection.GetColumnMappingBySchemaAction%2A> method, and the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection.GetTableMappingBySchemaAction%2A> method.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.MissingMappingAction Error = int32(3)

Docs.summary: An T:System.InvalidOperationException?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True is generated if the specified column mapping is missing.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.MissingMappingAction Ignore = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The column or table not having a mapping is ignored. Returns `null`.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.MissingMappingAction Passthrough = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The source column or source table is created and added to the T:System.Data.DataSet?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True using its original name.
